Title: S6:E1 - How do you build a database? (Jeff Nelson)
Description: Jeff is an executive at two very different tech companies, but data is at the heart of both. He describes how he uses data to make apps better and smarter, how he got started in the world of data, and how he built a database of his own. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
